meanings.sent1: She is regularizing her study schedule to ensure she studies every day.
meanings.sent2: The company is regularizing its procedures to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: Regularizing her morning routine helped Sarah get to work on time.
meanings.sent4: By regularizing his exercise routine, John felt more in control of his health.
meanings.sent5: Regularizing the watering schedule for the plants made them thrive.

meanings.definition: To bring into conformity with a standard or rule
meanings.sent1: The school is regularizing its dress code to align with the new policy.
meanings.sent2: Regularizing the data entry process will ensure accuracy in the records.
meanings.sent3: Regularizing the traffic flow in the city made commuting less chaotic.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a traffic cop regularizing the movement of toy cars on the play mat.
meanings.sent5: Regularizing the font sizes on the poster made the information clearer.
